knight_and_percival_introduction_dialogu.message: Hey you! Come over here! Finally, took you long enough.

options.option_text: I'm here, now tell me what you want?

knight_and_percival_introduction_dialogu.message: I need your help. I'm trapped in here with no way out.

options.option_text: Okay, I'll see what I can do.

knight_and_percival_introduction_dialogu.message: Please, I have to get out of here.
I was working my way behind the wall through that hole next to you.  I wanted to get around the trap above this room, but the wall caved in behind me.  Now I'm trapped in here.
Look for the key to this door, it has to be somewhere nearby.
